configurable.i18n_description: Ronnie is 7 For all Mankind’s skinny fit jean for men with a contemporary narrow cut, mid-rise and zip fly. LA mid used denim is the epitome of a cool, casual jean with subtle contrast fading and a light washed aesthetic. The Ronnie, skinny fit jeans are finished with brass hardware and contrast stitching.
configurable.i18n_description_de: Ronnie is 7 For all Mankind’s skinny fit jean for men with a contemporary narrow cut, mid-rise and zip fly. LA mid used denim is the epitome of a cool, casual jean with subtle contrast fading and a light washed aesthetic. The Ronnie, skinny fit jeans are finished with brass hardware and contrast stitching.
configurable.i18n_description_nl: Ronnie is 7 For all Mankind’s skinny fit jean for men with a contemporary narrow cut, mid-rise and zip fly. LA mid used denim is the epitome of a cool, casual jean with subtle contrast fading and a light washed aesthetic. The Ronnie, skinny fit jeans are finished with brass hardware and contrast stitching.
configurable.i18n_description_fr: Ronnie is 7 For all Mankind’s skinny fit jean for men with a contemporary narrow cut, mid-rise and zip fly. LA mid used denim is the epitome of a cool, casual jean with subtle contrast fading and a light washed aesthetic. The Ronnie, skinny fit jeans are finished with brass hardware and contrast stitching.
configurable.i18n_description_it: Ronnie is 7 For all Mankind’s skinny fit jean for men with a contemporary narrow cut, Vita media and zip fly. LA mid used denim is the epitome of a cool, casual jean with subtle contrast fading and a light washed aesthetic. The Ronnie, skinny fit jeans are finished with brass hardware and contrast stitching.
configurable.i18n_description_es: Ronnie is 7 For all Mankind’s skinny fit jean for men with a contemporary narrow cut, mid-rise and zip fly. LA mid used denim is the epitome of a cool, casual jean with subtle contrast fading and a light washed aesthetic. The Ronnie, skinny fit jeans are finished with brass hardware and contrast stitching.
configurable.i18n_product_details:
• Measurements based on Size 32
  • Approx. inseam: 34in
  • Rise: Front: 9in
  • Leg opening: 14in
  • Measurements may vary based on size, fabric and wash
  • 98.7% Cotton 1.3% Elastane
  • Wash and dry separately. Turn inside out before washing.


  • Machine wash, max 30° C, max agitation
  • Do not use Chlorine-based bleach
  • Thumble dry at low heat
  • Warm Iron (max 150°C)
  • Do not dry clean
configurable.i18n_product_details_de:
• Maße basieren auf Größe 32
  • Beinlänge ca. 86 cm
  • Leibhöhe: Vorne: 23 cm
  • Fussweite: 35.5 cm
  • Die Maße können je nach Größe, Material und Waschung variieren
  • 98.7% Baumwolle 1.3% Elastane
  • Separat waschen und trocknen. Auf links waschen.


  • Maschinenwäsche bei max. 30°C. Hoher Schleudergang
  • Keine Chlorbleiche verwenden
  • Bei geringer Hitze im Trockner trocknen
  • Auf mittlerer Stufe bügeln (max. 150°C)
  • Nicht chemisch reinigen
configurable.i18n_product_details_nl:
• Afmetingen gebaseerd op maat 32
  • Binnenbeenlengte ca. 86 cm
  • Kruisnaad: Voor: 23 cm
  • Zoomwijdte: 35.5 cm
  • Afmetingen kunnen variëren op basis van maat, stof en wassing
  • 98.7% Katoen 1.3% Elastane
  • Apart wassen en drogen. Voor het wassen binnenstebuiten keren.


  • Machine wassen, max. 30°C, max. toerental
  • Gebruik geen bleekmiddel op chloorbasis
  • Trommeldrogen op de laagste stand
  • Warm strijken (max. 150°C)
  • Niet chemisch reinigen
configurable.i18n_product_details_fr:
• Mesures sur la base de la taille 32
  • Inseam: sur 86 cm
  • Fourche: Avant: 23 cm
  • Ouverture des jambes: 35.5 cm
  • Les mesures peuvent varier en fonction de la taille, du tissu et du lavage
  • 98.7% Coton 1.3% Elastane
  • Laver et sécher séparément. Laver à l'envers.


  • Laver en machine, 30°C maximum, essorage rapide
  • Ne pas utiliser d’eau de javel ou d’autre produit à base de chlore
  • Sèche-linge à basse température
  • Repassage température moyenne (150°C maximum)
  • Nettoyage à sec interdit
configurable.i18n_product_details_it:
• Misure basate sulla taglia 32
  • Lunghezza dal cavallo alla caviglia: circa 86 cm
  • Lunghezza dal cavallo alla vita: Davanti: 23 cm
  • Apertura gamba: 35.5 cm
  • Le misure possono variare in base alla taglia, al tessuto e al lavaggio
  • 98.7% Cotone 1.3% Elastane
  • Lavare e asciugare separatamente. Lavare il capo a rovescio.


  • Lavare in lavatrice, max 30°C, centrifuga alta
  • Non candeggiare con prodotti a base di cloro
  • Asciugatrice a bassa temperatura
  • Stirare a temperature media (max 150°C)
  • Non lavare a secco
configurable.i18n_product_details_es:
• Medidas basadas en la Talla 32
  • Tiro aproximado: 86 cm
  • Tiro: Frontal: 23 cm
  • Abertura de la pierna: 35.5 cm
  • Las medidas pueden variar dependiendo de la talla, material y teñido
  • 98.7% Algodón 1.3% Elastane
  • Lavar y secar por separado. Poner del revés antes de lavar.


  • Lavado a máquina, temperatura máx. 30°, agitación intensa
  • No usar blanqueador a base de cloro
  • Secadora a temperatura baja
  • Planchado en caliente (máx. 150°C)
  • No limpiar en seco
